xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content: export.pdf.options.template=Template export.pdf.options.template.hint=Le template PDF contrôle les informations affichées sur la page de garde, dans la table des matières ainsi que dans l'entête et le bas de page de chaque page. ### Missing: export.pdf.options.loadFailure=Failed to load the PDF export options. ### Missing: export.pdf.modal.close=Close ### Missing: export.pdf.inProgress=Exporting as PDF... ### Missing: export.pdf.failed=Failed to export as PDF ### Missing: export.pdf.canceling=Canceling PDF export... ### Missing: export.pdf.canceled=PDF export canceled ### Missing: export.pdf.cancelFailed=Failed to cancel the PDF export ### Missing: export.pdf.templates.default=Default template ### Missing: export.pdf.templates.default.versionInfo=Version {0} authored by {1} on {2} ### Missing: export.pdf.template.name=PDF Template ### Missing: export.pdf.template.hint=Template used by PDF export ### Missing: export.pdf.template.provider=PDF Template Provider ### Missing: export.pdf.template.skinExtensionInfo=The CSS and JavaScript skin extensions provided by this page are also part of the PDF template and thus are loaded automatically when the PDF template is used. ### Missing: admin.export.pdf=PDF Export ### Missing: admin.export.pdf.description=Configure how wiki pages are exported to PDF. ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.TemplateClass_cover=Cover ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.TemplateClass_cover.hint=The information displayed on the first page. E.g. the title and the author ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.TemplateClass_toc=Table of Contents ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.TemplateClass_toc.hint=Usually lists the content headings along with their page numbers. ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.TemplateClass_header=Header ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.TemplateClass_header.hint=The information displayed at the top of each page, except for the cover page. E.g. the title ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.TemplateClass_footer=Footer ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.TemplateClass_footer.hint=The information displayed at the bottom of each page, except for the cover page. E.g. the number of the page ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.ConfigurationClass_templates=Templates ### Missing: XWiki.PDFExport.ConfigurationClass_templates.hint=The list of PDF templates the user can select from when exporting wiki pages to PDF.
